titleStmt.title: An epistle by way of encouragement to Friends, to be frequent at week-day meetings.
titleStmt.author: Eccleston, Theodor, 1651-1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: Pr]inted by T. Sowle, at the Crooked Billet in Holy-well-Lane, Shoreditch.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and torn with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Swarthmore College Library.
